website_summaries.verdict: The best general-purpose cream dispenser with excellent build-quality to last a long time.
pros: Stainless steel body is easy to clean after heavy use
Usable at home or in professional kitchens
Comes with a complete set of different dispensing nozzles
cons: Different dispensing nozzles require some extra time to learn to use correctly

customer_reviews.title: YUM YUM!
customer_reviews.text: So good! I have so far made a chocolate, peanut butter and a salted caramel whipped cream and I love them all. I am using sugar free flavored syrups with heavy whipping cream. Salted caramel is my favorite so far. I cant wait to try fruit flavors next. 1-2 oz flavored syrup, 1 cup heavy whipping cream.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Schwabenbauer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the few extra dollars best on the market for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: This product is so well designed and well built it is bordering on ludicrous. They even scalloped out some of the threads on the inside of the lid so that if somebody were to try to remove the lid while it's under pressure it will vent out the side instead of exploding only product I've seen that on. It holds whip cream without leaking any of the gasses over days. Smooth flow and a smooth trigger, the decorating tips are amazing, especially the injectors. Built for the serious professional and so easy for home use. I am rarely impressed with a product, but I am actually incredibly impressed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: james waltz

customer_reviews.title: Instant Whipped Cream
customer_reviews.text: Love fresh whipped cream on your desserts, coffee ... or just straight? But find making the stuff is way too time consuming? This awesome contraption makes it a breeze. Pour in your cream (and other ingredients), close the top, screw in a nitrous cartridge and just like that you have fresh whipped cream. This unit is a little more expensive than others, but it is made of high-grade metal, has a bunch of alternate attachments. It even comes with different colored rings if you're trying to match your whipped cream maker to the decor! Recommended for those who want the best whipped cream maker that you can buy!
customer_reviews.author: LUCK

customer_reviews.title: A quality investment for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: What is to dislike about this wonderful kitchen tool. Quality materials and craftsmanship as well as beauty make this whipped cream dispenser a positive addition for anyone looking for a very, very satisfying kitchen tool. Would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Scherberger

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this high-quality product. Works great. I put whipped cream on my coffee everyday, because I'm worth it! Put 3 T of powdered sugar and a t. of vanilla in a 2-cup pyrex measuring glass. Add heavy cream until the 2-cup mark. Mix it up, pour it in the dispenser, load the canister of gas, shake it up. I always test in the sink cuz sometime is splatters first. ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've always preferred ready whip over cool whip and being able to make it homemade without all the added chemicals and preservatives, not to mention the fact that it tastes better when you make it yourself. The unit works fantastically and I've used it several times since purchasing it and everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: sidney hoyle

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, there are cheaper ones that do a better job. The threads on the fixtures are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tasmanian Devil

customer_reviews.title: Received used one instead of new
customer_reviews.text: We payed for new one, but received used with scratches. We was waiting for 10 days and was very disappointed when opened the item. We felt deceived
customer_reviews.author: artem zimovets

customer_reviews.title: Great whipped cream, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This really does the job with whipped cream, the reason I bought it. It produces consistent, firm whipped cream and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Hembree

customer_reviews.title: My first experience with this type of product, everything worked as advertised, turned out great tasting whip cream with great
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with this type of product, everything worked as advertised, turned out great tasting whip cream with great consistency
customer_reviews.author: James W. Spada

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Seems pro level
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I think it's very simple to use and a quick read of the directions is all you need to know what to do. Getting a good feel for what is "too full" would be a good recommendation I could make to someone. The directions are clear about how much liquid to put in.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Shooter

customer_reviews.title: A good addition instead of canned whipped cream.
customer_reviews.text: Good size with a number of nozzles. The larger nozzles have a poor way to screw onto the adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Alder

customer_reviews.title: Use Daily and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo in love with this perfectly sized whip dispenser. I highly recommend this product and the customer service is personal, professional, and very patiently helpful. You must consider this as the best whip dispenser available because I sure do!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This cream dispenser is truly a professional piece of equipment. Very well made and great weight. I was delighted with how amazing the whipped cream covered the key lime pie. It was great looking but more important the perfect amount of cream. I am looking forward to making lots of deserts with this product.
customer_reviews.author: thomas belski

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love making my own no sugar whip cream. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Krampach

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly what you want!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, heavy duty and comes with all the different attachments for various different applications! Just the right size. Currently using it for my coffee😋
customer_reviews.author: MsBickford

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for with this type of product
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this one!!! SUPER heavy duty! The canister hold the pressure perfectly. Glad I didn't go with a cheaper option.
customer_reviews.author: Christy A Kasten

customer_reviews.title: nice to have multiple tips and bands
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the nicest dispenser’s I have used, nice to have multiple tips and bands, works great for creams and toppings. Also, great for infusing coffee and other drinks. I have contacted the company for other items and their customer service is fantastic. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate and feels durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and feels durable! All pieces are metal and seem sturdy and reliable. The color rings are rubber and are super easy to interchange as well.
customer_reviews.author: Klairissa

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box (which was dented torn) and parts are missing. The silicon grips, not a big deal to me, but the injector tips were also missing. I did not check other reviews to see if this is common by the seller but I highly suggest you do so before buying. Why pay for something you don't get. This dispenser seems well built though.
customer_reviews.author: aaron william salmela

customer_reviews.title: Requires three hands
customer_reviews.text: When we pull the handle it does not depress far enough to let anything out! You have to push the nozzle in to make it work, which requires three hands. Had this problem with both that we ordered. Is hefty and feels tough, but a huge pain to use during service. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for so long! I was super excited to get it! Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Deania Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is loads of fun! Reasonabel price when you consider everything that comes with it! Simple and easy to use, for the best whipped cream you'll ever taste. One of the nozzles had a defect, but it was a simple fix.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L.

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the right consistency with the whipped cream without clogging.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Whip Cream
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for making home made whip cream. N2O only. Does not work well for Nitro Coffee.
customer_reviews.author: fortherock

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Cream Anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to replace a dispenser I had. I am happy with the stainless steel nozzle heads and the bands that came with the dispenser. The recipes on the outer box were fantastic . It was a little pricey, but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel a.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to distinguish dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: How clever to include colored bands to distinguish what's inside dispenser. Makes reaching for dispenser quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Very fun product. Easy to make whipped cream and mousse. Bought a recipe book to find other ways to use this
customer_reviews.author: Regina Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: The siphon is very well built and works perfectly. I had a minor issue with the order (Amazon's fault) and the seller fixed it immediately over the phone. Excellent customer service. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nick RItter

customer_reviews.title: Missing silicone grips
customer_reviews.text: Received package and it did not include the interchangeable silicone rubber grips — please send to us . Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Russell Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good quality whipping siphon
customer_reviews.text: It is all metal, easy to use, easy to clean and comes with all the tips you should need. This is more expensive than others, but worth it I think to have the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Different attachments,Affordable. A must have for all cooks.
customer_reviews.text: I love it that it comes with different attachments. I love it so much that I bought another one for a gift. The price is very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I made was microwave chocolate sponge cake. Turned out great. Can’t wait to try more new stuff.
customer_reviews.author: James Bonine

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to use. The adapter is a nice fit however the whipped cream nozzles are a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: David Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time but did not include the 3 injector tips or the 6 silicone rings
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this its so amazing preparing whip cream for our deserts is a synch. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We use this dispenser almost every day and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it. It is a Christmas present for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Conroe

customer_reviews.title: Too Slow!
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed with this dispenser. I'll be sticking with the Isi we had previously purchased. You get what you pay for I suppose. The dispenser doesn't expel cream at anything more than a literal snails pace... it's much too slow for doing what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Katsaros

customer_reviews.title: Hot hollandaise direct inject.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid and well designed piece of equipment. I've used this for a few applications, nominally whipped cream, but it also terrific for hot hollandaise sauce injections into a crepe roll. The only issue I have found is if there are sand sized speck components to the liquid, it will get stuck in the aeration head. So I just powder the heck out of everything and it runs fine. The silicone bands are good for writing on with what's in there. Prechill the canister for optimal whipped cream fun.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham M. Beane

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel....it matters!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it is stainless steel and with it being under pressure I didn’t want to take the chance of corrosion. It’s a little pricey compared to the others but it is stainless steel and super heavy duty, it also came with extra tips for a variety of other cooking uses. So.... I would highly recommend this product, easy to use, no worries about corrosion, FUN, and quite a statement when dispensing the whip cream in front of your guests. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good Dispenser, BUT...DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a WAS good dispenser, BUT...the nozzles which are utilized most often, attach in a VERY flimsy manner. REVIEWING AGAIN BECAUSE AFTER ONLY A FEW MONTHS, IT HAS FAILED COMPLETELY!!! WILL NOT HOLD IN THE AIR CARTRIDGE PRESSURE AND IT LEAKS OUT!!! Appears to be a well made product, but is not. Will definitely not buy this product again! Seek another brand.
customer_reviews.author: K Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best Gear In My Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful device. I always wanted one of these and it works perfectly. So far I've used heavy whipping cream and yum, it's perfection. I don't eat sugar so this enables me to create my own coffee toppings. I will likely buy another one. I LOVE THIS THING! ♥️ Note: there's a bit of a learning curve with the chargers. Otis has a video on YouTube that's helpful to watch. I recommend it when you're first learning how to use your Whipper.
customer_reviews.author: Peridot

customer_reviews.title: Whipped cream dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described, item arrived on time. How ever box was damaged and smaller parts were falling out of product box into shipping box luckily nothing got damaged or lost. And works great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Aluminum - Stainless.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was a stainless product vs aluminum. At times I have difficulty with it working properly - but when it does, it is nice to have fresh whipped cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Cream Dispenser Stainless Steel rusting after 6 week of use.
customer_reviews.text: The Whipped Cream Dispenser Stainless Steel started rusting after 6 week of use. Working with seller to see if they will fix this problem. Rust is in the area where air chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Whipped Cream Maker.
customer_reviews.text: A solid & sturdy device that does its job well. Added attachments are a plus, but the essential Whipped Cream maker stands on its own merit. Its parts clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hermes Franqui

customer_reviews.title: Special touch for special desserts
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if the guests would stop shaking it as you would the can from the grocery store. You really only need to shake it a few times...then stop!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift; used a credit towards purchase. It is well made and heavy. Replaces an older different model. Is used daily for adding to coffee! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Homemade Cream
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Make your own flavor of whipping cream. Already purchased extras for gifts this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Curmi

customer_reviews.title: Well built dispenser. Don’t waste money on cheaper products.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this dispenser. Sturdy construction. Solid. Once you pick it up you will feel that the steel makes a difference in terms of quality. Been using it over two months and have yet to encounter a problem. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Currie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I will never make whipped cream any other way. This is so easy
customer_reviews.author: Pat from CT

customer_reviews.title: tasty whipcream
customer_reviews.text: great product and fun...the BEST thing is the sellers! they worked with us over a small issue and it all worked out wonderfully! awesome job!
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Service great. Unit not working as supposed too
customer_reviews.text: This unit literally explodes whip cream everywhere and leaks from somewhere but can’t hear the leak. I wouldn’t recommend, returning it.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and keeps your whipped cream in great ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I ever did without this cream whipper. It is easy to use and keeps your whipped cream in great condition for a couple of weeks. I just love the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: COcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work and it is amazing! We have had so much fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I am so glad that I have chosen this cream dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Olivera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I am a lover of cream puffs and this dispenser works perfectly. I even purchased two more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Otis is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Brother because I purchased the same brand myself. This set has all of the injectors designed for the Otis machine. Schrader charging valve will leak just a little bit. Suggest you buy a Viton or butyl rubber O-ring to place under the plastic cap after charging. Make sure you use a small amount of silicone grease on the ALL SS threads so they do not gall. I use Dow Corning High Vacuum Grease. It is food grade.
customer_reviews.author: Yarbles

product_meta.title: Whipped Cream Dispenser Stainless Steel - Professional Whipped Cream Maker - Gourmet Cream Whipper - Large 500ml / 1 Pint Canister - 3 Decorating Nozzles, 4 Injector Tips and 5 Colored Silicone Grips
feature_bullets: COMMERCIAL GRADE - Built for the food service industry, ideal for home use
STAINLESS STEEL - Fully constructed with 304/18-8 food grade stainless steel
PERFECT HOLIDAY GIFT - Great Christmas Gift for the baker in your life who loves holiday desserts!
SILICONE BANDS - 6 interchangeable colors. Grip, cold protection and style.
MULTI USE - Use your whipper to make cream, mousses and even infuse cocktails
